verses.text: In that day there shall be a fountain opened to the house of David and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem for sin and for uncleanness.

And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the LORD of hosts, \add that\add* I will cut off the names of the idols out of the land, and they shall no more be remembered: and also I will cause the prophets and the unclean spirit to pass out of the land.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* when any shall yet prophesy, then his father and his mother that begat him shall say to him, Thou shalt not live; for thou speakest lies in the name of the LORD: and his father and his mother that begat him shall thrust him through when he prophesieth.
And it shall come to pass in that day, \add that\add* the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision, when he hath prophesied; neither shall they wear a rough garment to deceive:
But he shall say, I \add am\add* no prophet, I \add am\add* a husbandman; for man taught me to keep cattle from my youth.
And \add one\add* shall say to him, What \add are\add* these wounds in thy hands? Then he shall answer, \add Those\add* with which I was wounded \add in\add* the house of my friends.

Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man \add that is\add* my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn my hand upon the little ones.
And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in all the land, saith the LORD, two parts therein shall be cut off \add and\add* die; but the third shall be left therein.

And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It \add is\add* my people; and they shall say, The LORD \add is\add* my God.
